content.prompt: By saying "Pragmatism is an account of the way people think" (Paragraph 1), the author implicitly acknowledges that

choices.label: the thinking process is probably impossible to comprehend intellectually
there may be other theories that explain the way we think
pragmatism has come to dominate current philosophical discourse
pragmatism can reconcile differences among belief systems

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain ways claims are qualified through modifiers, counterarguments, and alternative perspectives.
